evidence.text: Person A: I didn’t get that. I feel like you have to come from a certain background to feel that irony.

Person A: Oh, my kid and I have this joke about fiddlehead ferns.
Person A: You probably have to be there. He has this little two year old accent. It’s like a lisp. ‘feeeedle dee dee’.

Person B: Burning a hole in me. And the woman I used to be - the talented and plucky young woman with big ideas-
Person B: She’s down there also. In my intestines, buried in kale, biding her time. Or maybe she’s dead. Suffocated.

Person A: I’m dying to get to the nighttime exhibit at the Rubin!
Person B: Oh no. Here it comes.
Person A: I’m really into this show- like blown away. It’s very provocative. Very you.
